content: the daddy-o scarf is inspired by my stepfather whom i fondly call daddy-o this is a fairly easy scarf that uses single_crochet and a modified double treble_crochet the modified treble_crochet stitch eliminates the gap that is typically on the ws of post work this scarf uses just under 2 skeins of lion brand heartland yarn and a larger hook this pattern is available to view for free on my website the ad-free pdf includes the written directions a chart and gift tags for gifting there is a video tutorial with timestamps and this pattern has been tested this pattern is copyright 2023 handmade by stacy j please do not duplicate or copy any portion of this pattern as well as photographs you are encouraged to share images of your final product and are allowed to sell final products i just ask that if you sell your final product please purchase the ad-free pdf provide your own photographs and that you please credit handmade by stacy j as the designer thank you for your support
